GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 08 September 2025
Showers or thundershowers will occur in most parts of the island after 1.00 p.m.
Fairly heavy falls above 75 mm are likely at some places.

temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
